name: Scratchx-audio
body:
## ScratchX Audio Oscillator
This is an extension to use sound oscillator in [Web Audio API](http://www.w3.org/TR/webaudio/) for [ScratchX](http://scratchx.org).

[open Scratchx with Audio Oscillator](http://scratchx.org/?url=http://yokobond.github.io/scratchx-audio/audio-oscillator.js)

### limitation
You can use one oscillator to make sound.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
